embeds.title: Griamore (Fiche)
embeds.description:
Résumé : Griamore
A tanky barrier-focused character. Sword & Shield provides defensive stancing and DEF scaling damage; Nunchucks generates barriers to cycle Special Attack quickly for burst damage; Gauntlets excels at Stun control and Burst Gauge acceleration.
